argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | djhsumss.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | djhsumss.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | djhsumss.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 4 |  | djhsumss.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) |
| 5 |  | djhsumss.j | |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 6 |  | djhsumss.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 7 |  | djhsumss.x | |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) |
| 8 |  | djhsumss.y | |- ( ph -> Y C_ V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSpan ` U ) = ( LSpan ` U ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 6 | #P_dvhlmod | |- ( ph -> U e. LMod ) |
| 11 | 3, 9, 4, 7, 8, 10 | #P_lsmssspx | |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) Y ) C_ ( ( LSpan ` U ) ` ( X u. Y ) ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 9, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_djhspss | |- ( ph -> ( ( LSpan ` U ) ` ( X u. Y ) ) C_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_sstrd | |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) Y ) C_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) |
